quiz.question: Which is accurate about antiperspirant and breast cancer?
options: No convincing evidence links normal antiperspirant use to breast cancer
All deodorants always cause cancer
Antiperspirant use causes breast cancer
quiz.answer: No convincing evidence links normal antiperspirant use to breast cancer

quiz.question: Which statement about fruit juice and fiber reflects nutrition facts?
options: Whole fruit retains more fiber while juice often removes fiber and concentrates sugar
Fruit juice has more fiber than whole fruit
Fruit juice is nutritionally identical to whole fruit
quiz.answer: Whole fruit retains more fiber while juice often removes fiber and concentrates sugar

quiz.question: Which documented consequence relates to unregulated weight-loss supplements?
options: Unregulated supplements have caused liver injuries and product recalls in multiple cases
Regulators approve every supplement automatically
All weight-loss supplements are harmless and effective
quiz.answer: Unregulated supplements have caused liver injuries and product recalls in multiple cases

quiz.question: Which belief about eggs and cholesterol reflects current evidence?
options: For most people, moderate egg consumption has minimal impact on heart risk
All eggs are unhealthy and should be avoided
Eating eggs always raises harmful cholesterol significantly
quiz.answer: For most people, moderate egg consumption has minimal impact on heart risk

quiz.question: Which statement about eye exercises improving vision is accurate?
options: Eye exercises permanently correct refractive errors like myopia
Eye exercises may relieve strain but not reverse structural refractive errors
Eye exercises cure cataracts
quiz.answer: Eye exercises may relieve strain but not reverse structural refractive errors

quiz.question: Which documented interaction raises concern about grapefruit and prescription drugs?
options: Grapefruit enhances all drug efficacy indiscriminately
Compounds in grapefruit can inhibit CYP3A4, altering metabolism of many drugs
Grapefruit has no effect on drug metabolism
quiz.answer: Compounds in grapefruit can inhibit CYP3A4, altering metabolism of many drugs

quiz.question: Which idea about cold weather and catching colds is supported by research?
options: Viruses spread more in close indoor settings during cold weather
Cold air kills immunity immediately
Cold weather by itself causes viral infections
quiz.answer: Viruses spread more in close indoor settings during cold weather

quiz.question: Which historical fact explains the grapefruit diet's popularity?
options: A 1930s fad credited grapefruit with metabolism-boosting enzymes
Grapefruit naturally contains a unique weight-loss hormone
Grapefruit only became popular after the 2000s
quiz.answer: A 1930s fad credited grapefruit with metabolism-boosting enzymes

quiz.question: Which historical detail explains how the 8x8 water rule likely originated?
options: It was mandated by the World Health Organization in 1980
It derived from a 1945 USDA food guide suggesting total water intake from foods and drinks
It came from a 12th-century medical text
quiz.answer: It derived from a 1945 USDA food guide suggesting total water intake from foods and drinks

quiz.question: Which statement about cold showers burning fat is supported by science?
options: Cold showers stop fat storage completely
Cold showers dramatically increase fat loss for everyone
Cold exposure can slightly increase calorie burn but is not a primary weight-loss method
quiz.answer: Cold exposure can slightly increase calorie burn but is not a primary weight-loss method

quiz.question: Which statement about 'fat-free' labels and calorie content is accurate?
options: Fat-free products can still be high in sugars and calories
Fat-free implies healthier ingredients always
Fat-free always means low-calorie
quiz.answer: Fat-free products can still be high in sugars and calories

quiz.question: Which statistical result summarizes large reviews on vitamin C preventing colds?
options: Vitamin C increases cold incidence significantly
Regular vitamin C reduces cold duration modestly, with inconsistent prevention benefits
Vitamin C eliminates all colds in clinical trials
quiz.answer: Regular vitamin C reduces cold duration modestly, with inconsistent prevention benefits

quiz.question: Which idea about night-time eating and weight gain is supported by evidence?
options: Total calories and activity matter more than meal timing for most people
Night meals make the body store only fat
Eating late always causes weight gain regardless of calories
quiz.answer: Total calories and activity matter more than meal timing for most people

quiz.question: Which statement about 'natural' labeling on products aligns with regulations?
options: Natural automatically equals organic certification
Natural labeling has one universal legal definition worldwide
Natural labeling rules vary and may not guarantee safety or purity
quiz.answer: Natural labeling rules vary and may not guarantee safety or purity

quiz.question: Which nutritional nuance explains why whole grains reduce chronic disease risk?
options: Whole grains provide fiber, micronutrients, and lower glycemic impact versus refined grains
Whole grains directly cure genetic diseases
Whole grains are identical to refined grains in effect
quiz.answer: Whole grains provide fiber, micronutrients, and lower glycemic impact versus refined grains
